issue.title: Incorrect URDF to SDF conversion of gravity and self_collide tags

content.raw:
Has there been any progress in this?
Or where there any changes in the urdfdom or sdfdom respectively?
Because - at least - the ```selfCollide``` tag seams to work both in hydro and indigo (again?)
Or did I do something wrong when I reported the issue on gazebo answers?
I'm doubting myself...;-)
content.html: Has there been any progress in this? Or where there any changes in the urdfdom or sdfdom respectively? Because - at least - the selfCollide tag seams to work both in hydro and indigo (again?) Or did I do something wrong when I reported the issue on gazebo answers? I'm doubting myself...;-)
